TELEMETRY REF FILEUPLINK_PACKETOUTOFBOUNDS BIG_ENDIAN "During receipt of a file, the File Uplink component encountered a packet with offset and size out of bounds for the current file"
    # Hardcoded deployment file, fill in your deployment's common event items in Cheetah Template
    APPEND_ITEM SYNC 72 STRING "Sync pattern"  
    APPEND_ITEM LENGTH 32 UINT "Telemetry length"
    APPEND_ID_ITEM DESC 32 UINT 2 "Descriptor always 2 for EVR's"  
    APPEND_ID_ITEM EVR_ID 32 UINT 266 "EVR ID"
    APPEND_ITEM HDR_TIME_BASE 16 UINT "Time Base"
    APPEND_ITEM TIME_CONTEXT 8 UINT "Time Context"
    APPEND_ITEM SECS 32 UINT "Seconds"
    APPEND_ITEM USECS 32 UINT "Microseconds"

    APPEND_ITEM PACKETINDEX 32 UINT "The sequence index of the packet"
    APPEND_ITEM FILENAME_LENGTH 16 UINT "Length of String Arg"
    APPEND_ITEM FILENAME 0 STRING "The name of the file"

    ITEM MESSAGE 0 0 DERIVED "Formatted String for Argument"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf("Packet %u out of bounds for file %s" , packet.read('packetIndex') , packet.read('fileName') )
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_END
      META FORMAT_STRING "Packet %u out of bounds for file %s"
      META ARGS packetIndex fileName 
    ITEM EVR_SEVERITY 0 0 DERIVED "Severity"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf('WARNING_HI')
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_END
